caseTitle:
CIVIL MISC. APPLICATIONS NO.2593 AND 2812 OF 2008 IN
CIVIL APPEAL NO.1268 OF 2008
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE MIAN SAQIB NISAR, CJ
tagline: Limitation for filing appeal would commence from the date of preparation of the decree and the time elapsed between the announcement of the judgment and the signing of the decree shall be included in the time requisite for obtaining the copy of the judgment and decree.
